ai-ya3.3.5:1.1_0: When a sense-sphere knows the eye he does not completely understand it.
ai-ya3.3.5:2.1_0: One who understands the sense fields will completely understand, and there will be no eyes.
ai-ya3.3.5:3.1_0: One who doesn’t understand the fields of the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind.
ai-ya3.3.5:4.1_0: they will not completely understand the paths and don’t completely understand.
ai-ya3.3.5:4.1_1: They don’t become a perfected one, they will not completely understand the path to the dimension of infinite space and the dimension of infinite consciousness.
ai-ya3.3.5:5.1_0: But one who doesn’t completely understand the sense fields and does not completely understand it.
ai-ya3.3.5:6.1_1: They don’t become a perfected one, they will not completely understand the dimension of mastery.
